item.title: Example Talk
item.description:
Click on the Slides button above to view the built-in slides feature.

Slides can be added in a few ways:

  • Create slides using Wowchemy’s Slides feature and link using slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Upload an existing slide deck to static/ and link using url_slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Embed your slides (e.g. Google Slides) or presentation video on this page using shortcodes.

Further event details, including page elements such as image galleries, can be added to the body of this page.

item.title: 100 Peaks of Taiwan (百岳)
item.description:
16%

  • 2020/06 - Xueshan East Peak (雪山東峰), 3886m

  • 2020/06 - Xueshan (雪山主峰), 3201m


  • 2020/08 - Qilaishan South Peak (奇萊南峰), 3358m

  • 2020/08 - Nanhuashan (南華山), 3184m


  • 2020/09 - Taoshan (桃山), 3325m

  • 2020/09 - Kalayeshan (喀拉業山), 3133m


  • 2020/10 - Beidawushan (北大武山), 3092m


  • 2020/10 - Sanchashan (三叉山), 3496m

  • 2020/10 - Xiangyangshan (向陽山), 3603m


  • 2020/11, 2020/12 - Hehuanshan Main Peak (合歡主峰), 3417m

  • 2020/11, 2020/12 - Hehuanshan North Peak (合歡北峰), 3422m

  • 2020/12 - Hehuanshan East Peak (合歡東峰), 3421m

  • 2020/12 - Shimenshan (石門山), 3237m


  • 2021/01 - Bilushan (畢祿山), 3371m


  • 2021/03 - Xiluandashan (西巒大山), 3081m

  • 2021/03 - Jundashan (郡大山), 3265m


Some photos are credited to the awesome teammate and photographer Otus → Fllow him on Instgram

item.title: Travelling the World
item.description:
<div class="d-none"> <input id="map-provider" value="mapnik"> <input id="map-zoom" value="5"> <input id="map-init-lat" value="59.2915"> <input id="map-init-lng" value="17.9249"> <input id="map-num-markers" value="91">
<input id="marker0-lat" value="60.8611"> <input id="marker0-lng" value="7.1116"> <input id="marker0-title" value="Norway in a nutshell"> <input id="marker0-desc" value="還記得在 Flåm 下車時，彩虹橫亙峽灣兩端的美景； 那晚在小木屋喝著🍺&nbsp;，用著均非自己母語的語言談天說地 🥰"> <input id="marker0-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker0-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/norway_in_a_nutshell_hub3c399251442c43f3dde1c63c4f936bb_32281_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker1-lat" value="64.2789"> <input id="marker1-lng" value="-21.1286"> <input id="marker1-title" value="冰島紀行"> <input id="marker1-desc" value="天蒼蒼野茫茫的壯闊（但看到的是馬 🐎 而非牛羊）， 雜以地熱產生的蒸氣及遠處被雪覆蓋的山頭 🏔️"> <input id="marker1-date" value="April 2018">
<input id="marker1-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/iceland_landscape_huf3f7d7dfb111cd1bffa3454cce16dea7_30702_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker2-lat" value="59.9297"> <input id="marker2-lng" value="10.7012"> <input id="marker2-title" value="Chasing the light ✨"> <input id="marker2-desc" value="📍 維格蘭雕塑公園 (Vigelandsparken)"> <input id="marker2-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker2-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/chasing_the_light_hu5b093f58753f8a81cd863fd66e70423b_42080_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker3-lat" value="51.5076"> <input id="marker3-lng" value="-0.07508"> <input id="marker3-title" value="Tower Bridge"> <input id="marker3-desc" value="原本要等 magic hour 燒的通紅的雲彩，不料天氣太好到連一朵雲都沒有 😂&nbsp;， 完全暗下來後還比較好看<br />在橋下跟拿著大砲和水晶球 🔮&nbsp; 的攝影師一起等待絕佳時刻也是很特別的體驗 📸"> <input id="marker3-date" value="January 2018">
<input id="marker3-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/london_hue807a2d178e0fdaf5fa74cd80f74a251_28506_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker4-lat" value="48.8608"> <input id="marker4-lng" value="2.3522"> <input id="marker4-title" value="ART ❓ "> <input id="marker4-desc" value="📍 Centre Georges-Pompidou <br />藝術是比工程還高的事物，工程是有所局限的，而之所以現在成為顯學，是因為滿足時代的需要，最基本的需要，但像美學、文學這種或許不那麼容易養活一個人的學問，卻是更貼近人性、帶來更高層次的滿足"> <input id="marker4-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker4-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Pompidou_hu4b73ddb09af528fdab5ccc2d82537327_41399_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker5-lat" value="59.4389"> <input id="marker5-lng" value="24.7403"> <input id="marker5-title" value="塔林老城"> <input id="marker5-desc" value="環繞的古城牆，斑駁卻依然矗立的塔樓 🏰 <br />散發濃濃的古風，間或身著中世紀服裝者從身旁走過，令人不禁會心一笑。外圍海域並無防禦性小島作為防線的塔林位處前線，理所當然該有這些防禦設施"> <input id="marker5-date" value="September 2017">
<input id="marker5-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Tallinn_hu35f4059b26915728d0d862a34618af51_30034_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker6-lat" value="60.3782"> <input id="marker6-lng" value="5.3869"> <input id="marker6-title" value="Ulriken – Fløyen 健行"> <input id="marker6-desc" value="走在兩山之間的等高線上，並沒有什麼能阻擋我們的視野。太陽掛在天上，攝氏兩度，提供一點餘溫予於此行走的眾生。山頂上草茫茫，也鋪上了屬於秋季的褐黃"> <input id="marker6-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker6-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Bergen_hiking_hu69cf7aee447b812a0f301f67f2f5bef2_43009_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker7-lat" value="59.3266"> <input id="marker7-lng" value="18.1133"> <input id="marker7-title" value="皇族獵場 - 動物園島"> <input id="marker7-desc" value="📍 Djurgården <br />那天翹了 A1 Swedish，參觀完歷史博物館後，順道步行至曾經是皇族獵場，現在則是供各種動物們做日光浴的動物園島。瑞典的夏日是十分愜意的，午後剛剛好的陽光，讓人不自覺就繞島了一周 🍹"> <input id="marker7-date" value="August 2017">
<input id="marker7-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Stockholm_Djurgarden_hueabdbb672e04bbaefa340c6a5c29d8a6_27472_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker8-lat" value="59.3230"> <input id="marker8-lng" value="18.0456"> <input id="marker8-title" value="Kayak 初體驗 🛶 "> <input id="marker8-desc" value="適逢 INTERSPEECH，跟 Ray 和 Roy 一起從 Hornstulls 出發，到快接近市政廳的地方才折返，hen 有趣 😆 "> <input id="marker8-date" value="August 2017">
<input id="marker8-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Stockholm_kayak_hu07f6aa2fea0351bc45afe600b96a95de_30587_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker9-lat" value="55.6800"> <input id="marker9-lng" value="12.5909"> <input id="marker9-title" value="交換的第一次出國旅行 🎒"> <input id="marker9-desc" value="📍 Nyhavn, Copenhagen <br /> 第一次出國 (aka 出瑞典 😆&nbsp; )，嘗試了只花 20 丹麥克朗過完 3 天的極限窮遊，那 20 kr 還是因為要投置物櫃才獲得的，不然打算直接 0 元走跳哥本哈根（有體驗就好，下不為例 😂&nbsp; ）"> <input id="marker9-date" value="August 2017">
<input id="marker9-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Copenhagen_huac8864747aa43fde11b22d81575456d2_22010_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker10-lat" value="54.8981"> <input id="marker10-lng" value="23.8974"> <input id="marker10-title" value="Kaunas 街拍"> <input id="marker10-desc" value="過早走完維爾紐斯想看的點，臨時起意地來到 🇱🇹 &nbsp;的第二大城"> <input id="marker10-date" value="November 2017">
<input id="marker10-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Kaunas_hua2111a2171a2e067a45f385d579a1700_43130_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker11-lat" value="41.8991"> <input id="marker11-lng" value="12.4798"> <input id="marker11-title" value="⛪ 聖依納爵堂 - 壁畫"> <input id="marker11-desc" value="走進教堂，光線從穹頂的天窗透入，道道金黃光芒四散，落於殿內的祭壇上 <br />側廊樑柱上的浮雕精緻細膩，即便是在那翻飛的頂端亦如是，而天花板上的壁畫精彩程度也不遑多讓，訴說著神與神、神與人、人與人之間千年來的故事"> <input id="marker11-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker11-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Rome_church_hue1e2f8d2af49e2ad92ae9787380811fb_40301_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker12-lat" value="48.8599"> <input id="marker12-lng" value="2.3265"> <input id="marker12-title" value="Musée d'Orsay"> <input id="marker12-desc" value="在奧塞美術館度過了充實的一天。<br />相比於羅浮宮，奧塞收藏了更為近代的館藏，且又不似龐畢度中心對我而言過度現代、抽象，取得了剛好的平衡。聽著租借的語音導覽，領略每件作品背後的意涵實在滿足。"> <input id="marker12-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker12-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Orsay_hu2dcfe33bad8c7873f2c571ecf533fc58_39326_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker13-lat" value="59.3202"> <input id="marker13-lng" value="18.0623"> <input id="marker13-title" value="遠眺 Gamla Stan"> <input id="marker13-desc" value="📍 Mariaberget <br />這座城市中，我最喜歡的登高所在 🏙️ <br/> 春天來臨之時，從 Liljeholmen 沿著梅拉倫湖散步至市中心，最後在傍晚時分登上這裡，為這一天畫下句點"> <input id="marker13-date" value="April 2018">
<input id="marker13-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Stockholm_Mariaberget_hu00f0c3fa5bfdc0c2961ea7439b89a358_18843_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker14-lat" value="59.3318"> <input id="marker14-lng" value="18.0609"> <input id="marker14-title" value=" 🏳️‍🌈 Stockholm Pride"> <input id="marker14-desc" value="Gay since 1944 <br />初來瑞典沒有多久，就幸逢這場遊行 <br />瑞典的性別平等，不只是來自於口頭的支持，而是體現於人們的言行，企業福利和生活各個面向"> <input id="marker14-date" value="August 2017">
<input id="marker14-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Stockholm_parade_hub78dcb1658f6eeacf85aa021f3f7c870_47087_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker15-lat" value="41.8903"> <input id="marker15-lng" value="12.4931"> <input id="marker15-title" value="永恆之城 - Rome"> <input id="marker15-desc" value="📍 Colosseo <br />站在外圍看台上，感覺其實很複雜。<br />很難想像千年前有許多生命消逝在這裡，眾目睽睽之下，殺戮與寬恕，僅僅取決於觀眾們的 👍&nbsp; 或 👎&nbsp; ，在滿場躁動的呼聲中，從咽喉噴出的鮮血，灑在場中沙上… 而這些觀眾只不過是來找點日常生活中的樂子罷了"> <input id="marker15-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker15-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Rome_Colosseo_hu5c6a10da9d7c53ba55b8ee873de54c8e_46867_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker16-lat" value="56.9471"> <input id="marker16-lng" value="24.1068"> <input id="marker16-title" value="Riga"> <input id="marker16-desc" value="11 月的里加沒什麼觀光客，連拿相機出來都有種尷尬的感覺。天氣又陰陰的，比爾摩還冷的天氣，整座城市瀰漫著蕭瑟的氛圍。不過這幾天在里加吃 Lido 吃的非常之好，好久沒有吃到這麼便宜(?)又好吃的自助餐了 😋 &nbsp;"> <input id="marker16-date" value="November 2017">
<input id="marker16-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Riga_hudd91eb340103e0b71b4654c1b1e04ffc_34768_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker17-lat" value="41.9050"> <input id="marker17-lng" value="12.4551"> <input id="marker17-title" value="Musei del Vaticano"> <input id="marker17-desc" value="朝聖西斯汀禮拜堂和樓梯 😳"> <input id="marker17-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker17-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Vantican_museum_hu86221e959d4f1b4c813cb1c4b55bacfa_37905_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker18-lat" value="45.4372"> <input id="marker18-lng" value="12.3346"> <input id="marker18-title" value="水之 100 個島"> <input id="marker18-desc" value="📍 Venezia <br/>水路星羅棋布地遍佈整個城市，是個船禍等陸地意外都會有個水版本的所在。然而我們最後還是沒有搭貴桑桑的 Gondola"> <input id="marker18-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker18-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Venice_hu1e9ca9841b82aa2f7b9cdbe39400d606_37620_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker19-lat" value="48.8611"> <input id="marker19-lng" value="2.3380"> <input id="marker19-title" value="Musée du Louvre"> <input id="marker19-desc" value="在羅浮宮待了整整的一天，走到腳酸，還有一堆展館來不及去看，到後來只好用走馬看花模式速覽，以前看烏龍派出所用跑的逛羅浮宮還真不是沒有道理 😂"> <input id="marker19-date" value="October 2017">
<input id="marker19-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Louvre_hu72e3cd7ea4aef65b54c192733d64c5c8_24268_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker20-lat" value="38.9292"> <input id="marker20-lng" value="-119.9556"> <input id="marker20-title" value="Lake Tahoe"> <input id="marker20-desc" value="結束壓力山大的 midterm presentation，到 Tahoe 度過愜意的小週末 <br />原本是想去優勝美地的，卻好巧不巧遇到了大火封園，只能擇日再訪 <br /> 這次自作聰明用了 Booking 的 Premium，結果訂到超像恐怖片情節的飯店，真是對不住大家🤦‍♂️"> <input id="marker20-date" value="August 2018">
<input id="marker20-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Lake_Tahoe_hubad795bc21ad4078ba80343e9f36fb0f_26858_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker21-lat" value="42.9317"> <input id="marker21-lng" value="-122.1278"> <input id="marker21-title" value="火口湖國家公園"> <input id="marker21-desc" value="Long weekend 小旅行來到的最北方，這三個月來首度跨越加州，來到 Oregon <br /> 回程途中停在路肩旁看的銀河，在大水壩前撞見的 🦌 &nbsp...<br />這趟 road trip 有好多美好的風景 😌"> <input id="marker21-date" value="September 2018">
<input id="marker21-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Crater_lake_hud88bb8d0b436705fb32155fcea7d46d3_18217_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker22-lat" value="38.5583"> <input id="marker22-lng" value="-122.5426"> <input id="marker22-title" value="Napa Valley 酒莊之旅 🍷"> <input id="marker22-desc" value="加州和煦的陽光及乾燥的氣候，對如我這般屬陽光控 ☀️ &nbsp; (?) 的 engineer ，或對葡萄，都是絕佳的生長環境，也因此加州的紅酒亦頗富盛名<br /> <br />Napa 路上，兩旁種植了整片整片的橄欖和葡萄，在陽光的照耀之下，如同翡翠般閃耀光芒。開進酒莊的大門，大道兩旁栽植了修剪整齊的筆直松樹，甚是氣派"> <input id="marker22-date" value="August 2018">
<input id="marker22-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Napa_valley_hu1785b38ace976ea081ce5c24b1c50943_32526_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker23-lat" value="37.7786"> <input id="marker23-lng" value="-122.3903"> <input id="marker23-title" value="First MLB"> <input id="marker23-desc" value="📍 Oracle Park <br/> 人生第一場 MLB，巨人 vs 紅雀 <br /> <br /> 完成了一個小小夢想，一個在某個人生階段裡，會覺得如果可以這樣就好幸福好幸福的夢想"> <input id="marker23-date" value="July 2018">
<input id="marker23-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/SF_Giant_hu5cd1061b2a27e17be4c4f516412effc9_31904_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker24-lat" value="37.3317"> <input id="marker24-lng" value="-122.0083"> <input id="marker24-title" value="Summer in Apple Park"> <input id="marker24-desc" value="在 Apple 度過了一整個夏日時光 <br /> 適逢整個 team 遷進新總部，還沒有太多員工攜家帶眷吃飯玩耍的紛擾。沒有練球的日子，就熬到 7 點等著吃免錢的晚餐 (但我在那之前 5 點就下班去重訓或繞著飛碟跑步騎腳踏車 😆&nbsp; ) <br />人生中能有這樣的實習經驗真的很特別，感謝專題好夥伴 Wei 的帶飛 😊"> <input id="marker24-date" value="June 2018 - September 2018">
<input id="marker24-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Apple_park_hu806e6bc203c2b4a1029e56c42d8defa2_22544_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker25-lat" value="37.3343"> <input id="marker25-lng" value="-122.0089"> <input id="marker25-title" value="Super food"> <input id="marker25-desc" value="IMHO, 灣區最棒的員工餐廳！<br />海放 Google 和 FB 的營養午餐😎 <br /><br /> PS 我喜歡藜麥"> <input id="marker25-date" value="September 2018">
<input id="marker25-img" value="/portfolio/media/thumbnail/world/Apple_food_hu980d7fac0affb5b44fe176f5f04ddc94_21162_0x300_resize_q75_lanczos.jpg">
<input id="marker26-lat" value="37.3308"> <input id="marker26-lng" value="-121.8938"> <input id="marker26-title" value="Adobe 總部"> <input id="marker26-desc" value="朝聖網美(用的工具)的發跡地"> <input id="marker26-date" value="July 2018">

item.title: Welcome to Wowchemy, the website builder for Hugo
item.description:
Overview

  1. The Wowchemy website builder for Hugo, along with its starter templates, is designed for professional creators, educators, and teams/organizations - although it can be used to create any kind of site
  2. The template can be modified and customised to suit your needs. It’s a good platform for anyone looking to take control of their data and online identity whilst having the convenience to start off with a no-code solution (write in Markdown and customize with YAML parameters) and having flexibility to later add even deeper personalization with HTML and CSS
  3. You can work with all your favourite tools and apps with hundreds of plugins and integrations to speed up your workflows, interact with your readers, and much more

Get Started

  • 👉 Create a new site
  • 📚 Personalize your site
  • 💬 Chat with the Wowchemy community or Hugo community
  • 🐦 Twitter: @wowchemy @GeorgeCushen #MadeWithWowchemy
  • 💡 Request a feature or report a bug for Wowchemy
  • ⬆️ Updating Wowchemy? View the Update Guide and Release Notes

Crowd-funded open-source software

To help us develop this template and software sustainably under the MIT license, we ask all individuals and businesses that use it to help support its ongoing maintenance and development via sponsorship.

❤️ Click here to become a sponsor and help support Wowchemy’s future ❤️

As a token of appreciation for sponsoring, you can unlock these awesome rewards and extra features 🦄✨

Ecosystem

  • Hugo Academic CLI: Automatically import publications from BibTeX

Inspiration

Check out the latest demo of what you’ll get in less than 10 minutes, or view the showcase of personal, project, and business sites.

Features

  • Page builder - Create anything with widgets and elements
  • Edit any type of content - Blog posts, publications, talks, slides, projects, and more!
  • Create content in Markdown, Jupyter, or RStudio
  • Plugin System - Fully customizable color and font themes
  • Display Code and Math - Code highlighting and LaTeX math supported
  • Integrations - Google Analytics, Disqus commenting, Maps, Contact Forms, and more!
  • Beautiful Site - Simple and refreshing one page design
  • Industry-Leading SEO - Help get your website found on search engines and social media
  • Media Galleries - Display your images and videos with captions in a customizable gallery
  • Mobile Friendly - Look amazing on every screen with a mobile friendly version of your site
  • Multi-language - 34+ language packs including English, 中文, and Português
  • Multi-user - Each author gets their own profile page
  • Privacy Pack - Assists with GDPR
  • Stand Out - Bring your site to life with animation, parallax backgrounds, and scroll effects
  • One-Click Deployment - No servers. No databases. Only files.

Themes

Wowchemy and its templates come with automatic day (light) and night (dark) mode built-in. Alternatively, visitors can choose their preferred mode - click the moon icon in the top right of the Demo to see it in action! Day/night mode can also be disabled by the site admin in params.toml.

Choose a stunning theme and font for your site. Themes are fully customizable.

License

Copyright 2016-present George Cushen.

Released under the MIT license.

item.title: User-realistic path synthesis via multi-task generative adversarial networks for continuous path keyboard input
DARTS-ASR: Differentiable Architecture Search for Multilingual Speech Recognition and Adaptation
Meta Learning for End-to-End Low-Resource Speech Recognition
Machine Comprehension of Spoken Content: TOEFL Listening Test and Spoken SQuAD
Slides
item.description:
Create slides in Markdown with Wowchemy

Wowchemy | Documentation

Features

  • Efficiently write slides in Markdown
  • 3-in-1: Create, Present, and Publish your slides
  • Supports speaker notes
  • Mobile friendly slides

Controls

  • Next: Right Arrow or Space
  • Previous: Left Arrow
  • Start: Home
  • Finish: End
  • Overview: Esc
  • Speaker notes: S
  • Fullscreen: F
  • Zoom: Alt + Click
  • PDF Export: E

Code Highlighting

Inline code: variable

Code block:

porridge = "blueberry"
if porridge == "blueberry":
    print("Eating...")

Math

In-line math: $x + y = z$

Block math:

$$ f\left( x \right) = ;\frac{{2\left( {x + 4} \right)\left( {x - 4} \right)}}{{\left( {x + 4} \right)\left( {x + 1} \right)}} $$

Fragments

Make content appear incrementally

{{% fragment %}} One {{% /fragment %}}
{{% fragment %}} **Two** {{% /fragment %}}
{{% fragment %}} Three {{% /fragment %}}

Press Space to play!

One Two Three

A fragment can accept two optional parameters:

  • class: use a custom style (requires definition in custom CSS)
  • weight: sets the order in which a fragment appears

Speaker Notes

Add speaker notes to your presentation

{{% speaker_note %}}
- Only the speaker can read these notes
- Press `S` key to view
{{% /speaker_note %}}

Press the S key to view the speaker notes!

  • Only the speaker can read these notes
  • Press S key to view

Themes

  • black: Black background, white text, blue links (default)
  • white: White background, black text, blue links
  • league: Gray background, white text, blue links
  • beige: Beige background, dark text, brown links
  • sky: Blue background, thin dark text, blue links
  • night: Black background, thick white text, orange links
  • serif: Cappuccino background, gray text, brown links
  • simple: White background, black text, blue links
  • solarized: Cream-colored background, dark green text, blue links

Custom Slide

Customize the slide style and background

{{< slide background-image="/media/boards.jpg" >}}
{{< slide background-color="#0000FF" >}}
{{< slide class="my-style" >}}

Custom CSS Example

Let’s make headers navy colored.

Create assets/css/reveal_custom.css with:

.reveal section h1,
.reveal section h2,
.reveal section h3 {
  color: navy;
}

Questions?

Ask

Documentation
